name: Bisker - CGI and bad files scanner
short_description: Bisker is a simple cgi scanner written in C language for GNU/linux platforms. It's an useful tool to find critical or dangerous cgis/folders/files on local and remote machines (also through proxy).

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
